select account_id, account_code, account_name, (select ifnull(sum(amount),0) from exp_account_buget m where m.account_id = t.account_id and m.period_id = ${@period_id} and m.book_id = ${@book_id}) buget_amount,
(select ifnull(sum(ifnull(dr_amount,0)-ifnull(cr_amount,0)),0) from exp_item i,exp_item_line l where l.account_id = t.account_id and i.item_id = l.item_id and i.period_id = ${@period_id} and i.book_id = ${@book_id}) emerge_amount from exp_account t where t.account_type = '0' and t.book_id = ${@book_id} order by t.priority
